directions: [["Preheat the oven to 350Â°F and set an oven rack in the middle position. Grease a 9-inch springform or regular cake pan with butter or nonstick cooking spray. If using a regular cake pan, line the bottom of the pan with parchment paper and grease again."],["In a small bowl, whisk together dry ingredients"],["Using a handheld mixer with beaters or a stand mixer with the paddle attachment, cream the butter and granulated sugar until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well and scraping down the sides of the bowl after each addition. "],["Beat in the wet ingredients. Don't worry if the batter looks grainy at this point; that's okay. Add the flour mixture and mix on low speed until just combined. "],["Using a rubber spatula, fold in the chopped apples."],["Scrape the batter into the prepared pan and even the top. Bake for about 40 minutes, or until the cake is golden and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. "],["Cool cake and remove from pan."],["Using a fine sieve, dust with powdered sugar and enjoy"],[""],[""]]
